synopsis.text: Kajiri Mushi, an eager 10-year-old insect, embarks on a hilarious journey to master the art of bottom biting in this gag comedy anime. As the 18th generation of his family's prestigious Biting Shop, he attends Biting School to hone his skills and inherit the family business. Alongside his family, who have recently opened a Bitery, and his friends, a diverse group of bottom biting bugs, Kajiri encounters a variety of amusing and unpredictable situations that revolve around their unique talent. From navigating the perils of unexpected flatulence to participating in challenging jaw technique exams, Kajiri is determined to perfect his craft and provide the ultimate bottom biting experience. As he delves deeper into the world of bottom biting, he uncovers legends of the elusive golden bottom, adding an extra layer of excitement to his adventures. With its unique premise and endearing characters, this anime is sure to bring laughter and lift spirits, proving that sometimes, a good bite on the bottom is all it takes to brighten up your day!
